wblut.geom

Class WB_ShapeReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.geom.WB_ShapeReader

  •  class WB_ShapeReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a Java2D shape or the more general PathIterator into a List of WB_polygon.

    The coordinate system for Java2D is typically screen coordinates, which has the Y axis inverted relative to the usual coordinate system.

    PathIterators to be converted are expected to be linear or flat. That is, they should contain only SEG_MOVETO, SEG_LINETO, and SEG_CLOSE segment types. Any other segment types will cause an exception.

    Author:
    Martin Davis, Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
